page.title: 17Transport in the area
page.content:
Public Transport to this very rural area is very sparse.{Shottisham}does not have a National Bus service but a {private coach}firm operates a service daily:Bickers of Coddenham ltd.They run a morning + evening service for those who work in Woodbridge and Ipswich with extra trips on Market Days. The{Waldringfield}area has a{ {National Bus}service as well as the private coach.The National Bus service runs between Felixstowe and Woodbridge via Waldringfield.
School children in the area travel by school bus.
Woodbridge has a{railway}station on the Ipswich to Lowestoft line but the main line station is at Ipswich.
